title: HW2
text:
pre <- c(130, 128, 116, 124, 133, 134, 118, 126, 114, 127, 141, 138, 128, 140, 137, 131, 120, 128, 139, 135)

post <- c(114, 98, 113, 99, 107, 116, 113, 111, 119, 117, 101, 119, 130, 122, 106, 106, 124, 102, 117, 113)





names <- paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
names(pre) <- names
names(post) <- names





change <- pre-post





mean(change)

[1] 17






decrease_indices <- which(change > 0)

decrease <- change[decrease_indices]

print(decrease)

 Subject_1  Subject_2  Subject_3  Subject_4  Subject_5  Subject_6  Subject_7 
        16         30          3         25         26         18          5 
 Subject_8 Subject_10 Subject_11 Subject_12 Subject_14 Subject_15 Subject_16 
        15         10         40         19         18         31         25 
Subject_18 Subject_19 Subject_20 
        26         22         22 






increase_indices <- which(change < 0)

increase <- change[increase_indices]

increase

 Subject_9 Subject_13 Subject_17 
        -5         -2         -4 






mean(decrease)

[1] 20.64706

title: HW2
text:
pre <- c(130, 128, 116, 124, 133, 134, 118, 126, 114, 127, 141, 138, 128, 140, 137, 131, 120, 128, 139, 135)

post <- c(114, 98, 113, 99, 107, 116, 113, 111, 119, 117, 101, 119, 130, 122, 106, 106, 124, 102, 117, 113)





names <- paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
names(pre) <- names
names(post) <- names





change <- pre-post





mean(change)

[1] 17






decrease_indices <- which(change > 0)

decrease <- change[decrease_indices]

print(decrease)

 Subject_1  Subject_2  Subject_3  Subject_4  Subject_5  Subject_6  Subject_7 
        16         30          3         25         26         18          5 
 Subject_8 Subject_10 Subject_11 Subject_12 Subject_14 Subject_15 Subject_16 
        15         10         40         19         18         31         25 
Subject_18 Subject_19 Subject_20 
        26         22         22 






increase_indices <- which(change < 0)

increase <- change[increase_indices]

increase

 Subject_9 Subject_13 Subject_17 
        -5         -2         -4 






mean(decrease)

[1] 20.64706

title: HW2
text:
Task 2: Basic Data Frame practice

1.

my_df <- data.frame(patient = names, pre_bp = pre, post_bp = post,  diff_bp=change)



2.

negative_bp_changes <- subset(my_df, diff_bp < 0)



3.

my_df$postbp120 <- my_df$post_bp<120



4.

knitr::kable(my_df)

title: HW2
text:
Task 3: List practice

1.

pretreatment <- c(138, 135, 147, 117, 152, 134, 114, 121, 131, 130)

aftertreatment <- c(105, 136, 123, 130, 134, 143, 135, 139, 120, 124)

names1 <- paste("Subject", 1:10, sep = "_")
names(pretreatment) <- names1
names(aftertreatment) <- names1
change <- pretreatment-aftertreatment
my_df1 <- data.frame(patient = names1, pre_bp = pretreatment, post_bp = aftertreatment,  diff_bp=change)
my_df1$postbp120 <- my_df1$post_bp<120
my_df1

              patient pre_bp post_bp diff_bp postbp120
Subject_1   Subject_1    138     105      33      TRUE
Subject_2   Subject_2    135     136      -1     FALSE
Subject_3   Subject_3    147     123      24     FALSE
Subject_4   Subject_4    117     130     -13     FALSE
Subject_5   Subject_5    152     134      18     FALSE
Subject_6   Subject_6    134     143      -9     FALSE
Subject_7   Subject_7    114     135     -21     FALSE
Subject_8   Subject_8    121     139     -18     FALSE
Subject_9   Subject_9    131     120      11     FALSE
Subject_10 Subject_10    130     124       6     FALSE




2.

my_list <- list(my_df1,my_df)
my_list <- list(treatment = my_df1,placebo=my_df)
my_list

$treatment
              patient pre_bp post_bp diff_bp postbp120
